scriptLines: query: 'SELECT DISTINCT prd_cat FROM [silver].[productos]\nWHERE prd_cat IS NOT NULL',
query: 'SELECT DISTINCT cst_country FROM [silver].[clientes]\nWHERE cst_country IS NOT NULL',
query: 'SELECT DISTINCT sls_order_dt FROM [silver].[ventas]\nWHERE sls_order_dt IS NOT NULL',
query: 'SELECT DISTINCT sls_ship_dt FROM [silver].[ventas]\nWHERE sls_ship_dt IS NOT NULL',
query: 'SELECT DISTINCT cst_gndr FROM [silver].[clientes]\nWHERE cst_gndr IS NOT NULL',
SourceBDGEN derive(CID = iif(startsWith(CID, 'NASA'), substring(CID, 4, length(CID)), CID)) ~> LimpiarCID
join1 derive(cst_gndr = iif(isNull(cst_gndr), GEN, cst_gndr)) ~> LimpiarGenero
